sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和华是智慧的开端，是在于完全委身于神。

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

sentences.english: AWE's data-based applications are the next generation of wireless communication and services.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏的数据库申请是无线沟通的下代和服务。

sentences.english: I was totally in awe, seeing some of their creations.
sentences.chinese: 我完全地敬畏，当看到一些人的创造。

sentences.english: You wonder at the miracle of this awesome display of Nature.
sentences.chinese: 你对自然的这个令人敬畏的展示奇迹啧啧称奇。

sentences.english: The spaciousness and gloom of this vast edifice produce a profound and mysterious awe.
sentences.chinese: 这座大寺空旷幽暗，使人产生深沉而神秘的敬畏之念。

sentences.english: We are awe-struck by enormous mammals that float.
sentences.chinese: 我们也心存敬畏，浮游哺乳的巨大。

sentences.english: Dragons are terrifying and awe-inspiring as they take wing and breathe fire .
sentences.chinese: 在它们飞行和喷火的时候，龙是很可怕和令人敬畏的。

sentences.english: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
sentences.chinese: 你把旌旗赐给敬畏你的人，可以为真理杨起来。

sentences.english: If anybody sees these two oil paintings. Can awe them the family background.
sentences.chinese: 任何人若看到这两幅油画，都会敬畏他们的家世。

sentences.english: Who is among you that feareth Jehovah, that obeyeth the voice of his servant?
sentences.chinese: 你们中间谁是敬畏耶和华听从祂仆人之话的。

sentences.english: gazing up into his face with an expression of awe.
sentences.chinese: 抬头凝视着他的脸，露出敬畏的神色。

sentences.english: There was a terrible grace in the move of the waves.
sentences.chinese: 起伏的波涛有一种令人敬畏的美。

sentences.english: I was always a little in awe of at-aunt Stephina Roos.
sentences.chinese: 我对斯蒂菲娜老姑总是怀着敬畏之情。

sentences.english: Angkor Wat has awed visitors since it was first built in the early twelfth century.
sentences.chinese: 吴哥窟在12世纪早期初建时就令参观者们敬畏不已。
这种仪式使我们心生敬畏。

definition: to admire/to revere/to look up to
